start.text: Come in, come in! Kick the dirt off and find a place to rest.
start.choice: What do you know about the Earl of Omonporch?
Do you not get any sunlight down here?
You seem much less formal than other Consortium merchants.

node.text:
Atacama, at your service. I serve as the chandler here for travelers like yourself. Jademouth sees a great deal of traffic from caravaneers and nomads crossing to and from the banana groves, and every now and then, oddities from Omonporch and beyond end up here. Why not take a look?
I also stock plenty of supplies if you're a delver yourself.

I am less immobile than you might think, and I do not spend all of my time here at my post. I frequently take the liberty of basking outside when the weather allows. Cat is a good warden, and I trust her to keep me safe.
That said, I do also keep a glowsphere with me. {{emote|*Atacama gestures with one of xyr vines.*}} It's a far cry from the high salt sun, but it does do well enough at keeping me nourished here as long as the prospectors water me now and then.

I hear such things a good deal. Truth be told, I've become a tad estranged from the Consortium since my assignment here, though I remain on good terms with them. Jademouth is something of an anathema for phyta looking to bask in the sun, and so I confess I dreaded my assignment when I got word of it.
Having been here some time now, though, I can see how shortsighted I was to worry without having ever been here myself. Perhaps the locals have influenced me, but the longer I stay away from the socialites, the more true to myself I feel. It's not like any of them envy me. Hah!
Ugh. Don't even get me started. Asphodel is a weed with more interest in presiding over xyr imaginary earldom with copies of xemself than doing anything useful.
node.choice: How can I convince Asphodel to lease the Spindle to Barathrum?

node.text:
Asphodel is many things, but most of all xe craves recognition. If you're looking to get into xyr good graces, you would be wise to bring some kind of tribute. Xe is mostly concerned with clout, so I would be ready to call in favors of your own.
Whatever the case, though, your best chance would be to go along with whatever tiring idea xe has dreamt up to appease xyr sense of superiority. Just avoid causing any trouble. Asphodel was mercurial even before xe took xyr spawn and left for Omonporch, and any chaos would make it unlikely that you could be able to salvage a diplomatic path.
node.choice: Thank you, Atacama. Live and drink.
